title: Taylor Swift Debut Album
description: Taylor releases her self-titled debut album, featuring country hits like 'Tim McGraw'.

title: Fearless Release
description: Her second album, 'Fearless,' propels her to stardom with hits like 'Love Story' and 'You Belong With Me'.

title: Speak Now Release
description: Taylor’s first self-written album, featuring hits like 'Mine' and 'Back to December'.

title: Red Release
description: Known for its genre diversity, 'Red' features hits like 'We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together'.

title: 1989 Release
description: Her first pop album includes iconic tracks like 'Shake It Off' and 'Blank Space'.

title: Reputation Release
description: 'Reputation' marks a darker, edgier turn in Taylor’s discography.

title: Lover Release
description: 'Lover' brings a return to lighthearted, romantic themes with hits like 'ME!' and 'You Need to Calm Down'.

title: Folklore Release
description: Her indie-folk album, written during the pandemic, receives widespread acclaim.

title: Evermore Release
description: A sister album to 'Folklore,' continuing its lyrical and musical themes.

title: Midnights Release
description: Her latest album explores nocturnal thoughts and emotions.
